channel.title: Statistics on Data Science Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Data Science Notes

item.title: Correlation
item.description: We should look at the correlation of our features with our target but also at the correlation between our different features. Correlation is the degree to which things move together The amount of sun and the amount of icecream tend to move together; if one is high, the other also tends to be high and if one is low the other also tends to be low. This is positive correlation.
